title: Fisichella recalls getting dream Ferrari call â€“ to drive one of its worst F1 cars
summary: For an Italian F1 driver, few roles are more coveted than a Ferrari race seat, but Giancarlo Fisichella had the misfortune of joining the team during a testing 2009 season

qa_pairs.question: Which team is traditionally considered the most prestigious in Formula 1 history?
In what year did Giancarlo Fisichella drive for Ferrari?
What is a common term used to describe a season where a team's performance is significantly below expectations?
